values: Family owned for many years. North Colonie Schools, newer rubber roof, long term tenants are month to month, low taxes, walkout basement. Dead end street. Needs updating but at this price you can't go wrong. Sold "AS IS" to settle estate.
787 to Tibbits Ave (Maplewood) exit. left on Cohoes Rd. (Rt 32). left on Arch Street. House on left.
Wood Floors, Wall to Wall Carpet
